vote.text: Amendment SA 3688 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3688 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Donnelly. (consideration: CR S5560; text: CR S5560) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3688 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Donnelly.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3688 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
